name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab - Bitcoin Price Checker v1.0

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep up to date with the latest Bitcoin (BTC) price on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep up to date with the latest Bitcoin (BTC) prices on every new tab opened. Keeps a history of the latest tabs opened with a snapshot of the price for easy compare. Live updates every 5 seconds. No refresh needed!
